      style sheet = vary dashing,
      1 = {pin in data = {text' = {$2\times 2$ 15\,dB}, when=x is 5, pin length=2ex}},
      2 = {pin in data = {text' = {$2\times 2$ 30\,dB}, when=x is 9, pin length=3ex, pin angle = 45}}
